column1: #text=One of my favorite weekly activities is going grocery shopping .
#text=Yesterday afternoon I took a casual stroll to my local Whole Foods and could not resist their tempting and rather delicious items .
#text=From the warm , freshly baked chocolate chip cookies , to the elaborate berries and cream cakes , there is not a product that does not disappoint .
#text=Another section I perused was the prepared food section .
#text=From pizza , tacos , a salad bar , and fried chicken , there was plenty to choose from .
#text=My eyes wandered to the burrito bar , as I glanced at the grilled chicken , steak and fajita vegetables .
#text=I ordered a grilled steak burrito stuffed with cheese , hot sauce , salsa , and guacamole .
#text=After I paid the kind chef who created it , I took one large mammoth bite and dug in .
#text=It was one of the most delicious burritos I had ever tasted .
#text=I made sure to definitely come back next time !
